verses.esv:
13   For you formed my inward parts;
    you knitted me together in my mother’s womb.
verses.kjv: 13 For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother’s womb.
verses.niv: 13 For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother's womb.

verses.esv:
5   “Before I formed you in the womb I knew you,
  and before you were born I consecrated you;
  I appointed you a prophet to the nations.”
verses.kjv: 5 Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee; and before thou camest forth out of the womb I sanctified thee, and I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.
verses.niv: 5 "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations."

verses.esv:
9   He gives the barren woman a home,
    making her the joyous mother of children.
  Praise the LORD!
verses.kjv: 9 He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.niv: 9 He settles the barren woman in her home as a happy mother of children. Praise the LORD.

verses.esv: 21 And Isaac prayed to the LORD for his wife, because she was barren. And the LORD granted his prayer, and Rebekah his wife conceived.
verses.kjv: 21 And Isaac intreated the LORD for his wife, because she was barren: and the LORD was intreated of him, and Rebekah his wife conceived.
verses.niv: 21 Isaac prayed to the LORD on behalf of his wife, because she was barren. The LORD answered his prayer, and his wife Rebekah became pregnant.

verses.esv: 28 And God blessed them. And God said to them, “Be fruitful and multiply and fill the earth and subdue it, and have dominion over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the heavens and over every living thing that moves on the earth.”
verses.kjv: 28 And God blessed them, and God said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth, and subdue it: and have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over every living thing that moveth upon the earth.
verses.niv: 28 God blessed them and said to them, "Be fruitful and increase in number; fill the earth and subdue it. Rule over the fish of the sea and the birds of the air and over every living creature that moves on the ground."

verses.esv:
27   So God created man in his own image,
    in the image of God he created him;
    male and female he created them.
verses.kjv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
verses.niv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

verses.esv: 11 By faith Sarah herself received power to conceive, even when she was past the age, since she considered him faithful who had promised.
verses.kjv: 11 Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed, and was delivered of a child when she was past age, because she judged him faithful who had promised.
verses.niv: 11 By faith Abraham, even though he was past age--and Sarah herself was barren--was enabled to become a father because he considered him faithful who had made the promise.

verses.esv: 3 And the angel of the LORD appeared to the woman and said to her, “Behold, you are barren and have not borne children, but you shall conceive and bear a son.
verses.kjv: 3 And the angel of the LORD appeared unto the woman, and said unto her, Behold now, thou art barren, and bearest not: but thou shalt conceive, and bear a son.
verses.niv: 3 The angel of the LORD appeared to her and said, "You are sterile and childless, but you are going to conceive and have a son.

verses.esv:
15   My frame was not hidden from you,
  when I was being made in secret,
    intricately woven in the depths of the earth.
verses.kjv: 15 My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.
verses.niv: 15 My frame was not hidden from you when I was made in the secret place. When I was woven together in the depths of the earth,

verses.esv: 5 But to Hannah he gave a double portion, because he loved her, though the LORD had closed her womb.
verses.kjv: 5 But unto Hannah he gave a worthy portion; for he loved Hannah: but the LORD had shut up her womb.
verses.niv: 5 But to Hannah he gave a double portion because he loved her, and the LORD had closed her womb.

verses.esv:
3:1 For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven:

2   a time to be born, and a time to die;
  a time to plant, and a time to pluck up what is planted;
3   a time to kill, and a time to heal;
  a time to break down, and a time to build up;
verses.kjv: 1 To every thing there is a season, and a time to every purpose under the heaven: 2 A time to be born, and a time to die; a time to plant, and a time to pluck up that which is planted; 3 A time to kill, and a time to heal; a time to break down, and a time to build up;
verses.niv: 1 There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under heaven: 2 a time to be born and a time to die, a time to plant and a time to uproot, 3 a time to kill and a time to heal, a time to tear down and a time to build,

verses.esv: 36 And behold, your relative Elizabeth in her old age has also conceived a son, and this is the sixth month with her who was called barren.
verses.kjv: 36 And, behold, thy cousin Elisabeth, she hath also conceived a son in her old age: and this is the sixth month with her, who was called barren.
verses.niv: 36 Even Elizabeth your relative is going to have a child in her old age, and she who was said to be barren is in her sixth month.

verses.esv:
3   Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD,
    the fruit of the womb a reward.
verses.kjv: 3 Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
verses.niv: 3 Sons are a heritage from the LORD, children a reward from him.

verses.esv: 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
verses.kjv: 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.niv: 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.

verses.esv:
54:1   “Sing, O barren one, who did not bear;
    break forth into singing and cry aloud,
    you who have not been in labor!
  For the children of the desolate one will be more
    than the children of her who is married,” says the LORD.
verses.kjv: 1 Sing, O barren, thou that didst not bear; break forth into singing, and cry aloud, thou that didst not travail with child: for more are the children of the desolate than the children of the married wife, saith the LORD.
verses.niv: 1 "Sing, O barren woman, you who never bore a child; burst into song, shout for joy, you who were never in labor; because more are the children of the desolate woman than of her who has a husband," says the LORD.

verses.esv:
23   Search me, O God, and know my heart!
    Try me and know my thoughts!
24   And see if there be any grievous way in me,
    and lead me in the way everlasting!
verses.kjv: 23 Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts: 24 And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
verses.niv: 23 Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and know my anxious thoughts. 24 See if there is any offensive way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.

verses.esv: 7 then the LORD God formed the man of dust from the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life, and the man became a living creature.
verses.kjv: 7 And the LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.
verses.niv: 7 the LORD God formed the man from the dust of the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life, and the man became a living being.

verses.esv: 26 None shall miscarry or be barren in your land; I will fulfill the number of your days.
verses.kjv: 26 There shall nothing cast their young, nor be barren, in thy land: the number of thy days I will fulfil.
verses.niv: 26 and none will miscarry or be barren in your land. I will give you a full life span.

verses.esv: 6 And her rival used to provoke her grievously to irritate her, because the LORD had closed her womb.
verses.kjv: 6 And her adversary also provoked her sore, for to make her fret, because the LORD had shut up her womb.
verses.niv: 6 And because the LORD had closed her womb, her rival kept provoking her in order to irritate her.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv: 21 Indeed the LORD visited Hannah, and she conceived and bore three sons and two daughters. And the boy Samuel grew in the presence of the LORD.
verses.kjv: 21 And the LORD visited Hannah, so that she conceived, and bare three sons and two daughters. And the child Samuel grew before the LORD.
verses.niv: 21 And the LORD was gracious to Hannah; she conceived and gave birth to three sons and two daughters. Meanwhile, the boy Samuel grew up in the presence of the LORD.

verses.esv: 24 Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
verses.niv: 24 For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they will become one flesh.

verses.esv: 14 You shall be blessed above all peoples. There shall not be male or female barren among you or among your livestock.
verses.kjv: 14 Thou shalt be blessed above all people: there shall not be male or female barren among you, or among your cattle.
verses.niv: 14 You will be blessed more than any other people; none of your men or women will be childless, nor any of your livestock without young.

verses.esv:
3   Your wife will be like a fruitful vine
    within your house;
  your children will be like olive shoots
    around your table.
verses.kjv: 3 Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
verses.niv: 3 Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house; your sons will be like olive shoots around your table.

verses.esv:
3   Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD,
    the fruit of the womb a reward.
4   Like arrows in the hand of a warrior
    are the children of one’s youth.
5   Blessed is the man
    who fills his quiver with them!
  He shall not be put to shame
    when he speaks with his enemies in the gate.
verses.kjv: 3 Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward. 4 As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth. 5 Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
verses.niv: 3 Sons are a heritage from the LORD, children a reward from him. 4 Like arrows in the hands of a warrior are sons born in one's youth. 5 Blessed is the man whose quiver is full of them. They will not be put to shame when they contend with their enemies in the gate.
